plugins.name: Language Weaver
plugins.description:
Language Weaver machine translation enables global organizations to manage multilingual content and workflows in real-time at scale. Protect your data, accelerate insight and ignite growth through Language Weaver technologies.


With the Language Weaver plugin for Figma, you can quickly and securely translate text nodes and full pages of content in Figma. These features will speed up time to market by allowing design and development teams to autonomously collaborate across languages, perform multilingual localization testing and publish translated content directly from their native working environment.


The Language Weaver plugin for Figma supports Cloud and Edge and multiple forms of authentication, giving teams access to all of their available machine translation resources at their fingertips.


A Language Weaver contract is required to use this plugin. Contact us to find out how to get access.

accepted.name: RWS Group
accepted.description:
A unique, world-leading provider of
technology-enabled language, content and intellectual property services.

plugins.tagline: Enterprise-grade machine translation

plugins.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
plugins.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text
plugins.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

126847.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
126847.description: Boost your design workflow with the Lorem Ipsum Inserter plugin for Figma. This easy-to-use plugin allows you to quickly add placeholder text to your designs. Whether you're working on prototypes, mockups, or UI components, simply click the button, and a block of Lorem Ipsum text will be inserted directly into your canvas. Additionally, the plugin supports replacing selected text with Lorem Ipsum, making it a time-saver for busy designers. Ideal for UI/UX designers looking to streamline their process with professional-looking placeholder text

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires access to all domains to fetch placeholder images and lorem ipsum text from various sources.

126847.release_notes:
Key Features (Excerpt for Release Notes)
Dynamic Word Count Matching: "Smart Lorem Ipsum" counts the number of words in each text layer within a frame (excluding punctuation) and generates Lorem Ipsum text with the exact same word count. For example, if a text layer contains "Hi, Jonathan" (2 words), it will be replaced with "Lorem ipsum" (2 words).
Seamless Integration: All text layers within a frame are automatically detected and updated with a single click.
126847.tagline: Instantly insert Lorem Ipsum text into your designs with a single click

plugins.name: UIQuill — Context-aware AI copywriter
plugins.description:
Transform Your Figma Designs with UIQuill ✨


Why Choose UIQuill?

  1. AI-Powered Text Enhancement: Get context-aware, optimized text suggestions for any layer or frame in your design.
  2. Instant Professionalism: Automatically correct grammar, punctuation, and style for compelling and polished text.
  3. Seamless Integration: Enjoy a sleek interface that adapts perfectly to both light and dark modes.
  4. Effortless Control: Refine every word, every paragraph, every frame with ease.


Supercharge Your Text in Seconds!

Elevate your designs with UIQuill—where AI meets creativity. Transform your text and bring your ideas to life.

plugins.name: Export to WebP
plugins.description:
Export to WebP transforms your Figma frames into optimised WebP images with just a few clicks.


WebP offers significantly smaller file sizes compared to PNG while maintaining excellent visual quality - perfect for web projects where performance matters.


Key Features


Smart Target File Size Optimisation ✨ NEW

•Set your desired file size (e.g., "100 KB" or "2 MB") and let the plugin automatically find the perfect quality setting

•Advanced binary search algorithm optimises quality to hit your exact target size

•Real-time progress feedback shows optimisation iterations

•Perfect for meeting specific file size requirements or bandwidth constraints

⠀

Advanced Transparency Control ✨ NEW

•Preserve or remove alpha channel (transparency) based on your needs

•Keep transparent backgrounds for overlays and UI elements

•Remove transparency for smaller file sizes when opacity isn't needed

•Smart default settings optimize for most common use cases


Efficient WebP Conversion

•Convert any Figma element to WebP format with high-quality results

•Save up to 30-75% in file size compared to PNG format

•Maintain visual quality while dramatically reducing file sizes


Flexible Quality Settings

•Choose from preset quality options (High Quality, Web Optimised, Ultra Compressed)

•Fine-tune compression with a precise quality slider (0-100%)

•Create and save custom quality presets for your specific needs


Batch Processing

•Convert multiple elements simultaneously

•Real-time progress tracking with accurate completion estimates

•Optimised memory usage for handling large selections


Export Options

•Save as a single ZIP file containing all WebP images

•Download individual WebP files directly

•Automatic naming based on your Figma layer structure


Detailed Statistics

•View before/after file size comparisons

•See exact file size savings for each conversion

•Track total compression savings across your selection


Simple Workflow

•Select elements → Choose quality → Convert → Download

•Integrates seamlessly with your Figma workflow

•Works with frames, components, groups, shapes, text, and more


Performance Optimised

•Fast conversions even for high-resolution graphics

•Memory-efficient processing for large batches


Please leave some feedback if you find this plugin useful :)
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to WebP - smaller files, same quality

plugins.name: Sticky Notes - Stickies
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Creator: Effortless Visual Note-Taking in Figma


Transform your design workflow with our intuitive Sticky Note Creator plugin! Quickly generate customizable, visually appealing sticky notes directly within your Figma workspace.


🌈 Key Features:

- Instant Sticky Note Generation

- Multiple Color Palette Options

- Responsive Design

- Easy Text Input

- Seamless Figma Integration


✨ How It Works:

1. Select your desired background color

2. Enter your text

3. Click "Create Sticky Note"

4. Instantly add notes to your design canvas


🎨 Color Options:

- Soft Yellow

- Pastel Pink

- Light Blue

- Mint Green

- Neutral Gray


Perfect for:

- Design brainstorming

Streamline your design process and keep your ideas organized with Sticky Note Creator!

plugins.name: Metaballs Ninja
plugins.description:
Elevate your designs with the Metaballs Ninja Plugin and explore the creative potential of organic shapes today!


Dynamic Shape Generation

Instantly create smooth, organic metaball shapes from simple circle objects.


Adjustable Magnetism

Control magnetism strength to determine how strongly circles blend together, allowing for unique shape variations.


Versatile Applications

Perfect for website design, logo creation, custom illustrations, interactive UI elements, and more.


Intuitive User Interface

User-friendly controls with real-time previews make designing metaballs effortless.


Customizable Colors

Easily select and apply colors to your metaball shapes to match your project's palette.


Seamless Figma Integration

Import your custom metaball creations directly into your Figma projects with one click.


Fast and Responsive Editing

Adjust individual metaball sizes and positions to fine-tune your designs.

accepted.description: UI/UX designer crafting Figma plugins for creatives and efficiency seekers.

plugins.name: XAMLIFY
plugins.description:
Keep your design files clean and optimized with this dual-purpose plugin. Automatically remove all invisible elements that clutter your workspace. Plus, quickly flatten your icons into simplified shapes, making them ready for export and implementation.


Key features:


One-click cleanup of all invisible elements

Bulk icon flattening for consistent results

Quickly detach all visible instances on the page with a single action

Maintain your file structure while reducing complexity

Perfect for design system maintenance and file optimization, this plugin saves time by eliminating tedious manual tasks. Whether you're a UI designer, a design system manager, or anyone aiming to keep their Figma files efficient and well-organized, it's the ultimate tool for maintaining clean and streamlined projects.
plugins.tagline: Clean, Flatten & Detach: Remove invisible layers, simplify icons, and detach instances in one click.

plugins.name: JSON to Canvas Ninja - fastest way from data to figma Design
plugins.description:
Effortlessly enhance your Figma designs with real data using JSON to Canvas Ninja. Populate your designs with actual product content, making your prototypes accurate, realistic, and production-ready. Say goodbye to placeholder text and lorem ipsum—design with confidence and bring your ideas closer to reality.


  1. generate infinite designs based on one single component, frame or group
  2. populate texts and images
  3. apply to any of your figma layers
  4. super straight forward UI
  5. easily distinguish image data from text data via an icon
  6. upload or paste your JSON (more options coming soon)


Link to a little how-to documentation


Any feedback is welcome. I will check and update the plugin based on it.
plugins.tagline: Import real JSON data into Figma, create realistic prototypes, bring designs closer to production.

plugins.name: Styles cloner
plugins.description:
If you need to reuse local styles from one file to another, Styles clone is here to help!


Whether you start new project or continue iterating on existing one, now you can easily update your local styles library with new tailored items.

Plugin supports all style types with unlimited nesting levels:

  1. 🔤 Text styles
  2. 🎨 Color styles
  3. 🥅 Grid styles
  4. 🖌️ Effect styles


How it works?

  1. Open Style cloner plugin in one Figma Design file
  2. Copy Styles to clipboard with the button in Get Styles section
  3. Open Style cloner in Design file you are working with
  4. Paste config in Paste styles section and click Paste button
  5. You're all set! 🕺


For those who want to a clean slate, use Delete styles option. It is self explanatory and works with no surprises.


This is not my first plugin so I pay attention to errors handling. You will be notified if something goes wrong with Figma's native toasts. Control and comfort is the first priority. Stay tuned for future updates.


If you like plugin please click like, save and leave a comment! Appreciate it!

Support: kolebaev.build@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Copy text, color, effetc and grid styles between files in a blink of an eye

117141.name: Styles cloner

plugins.name: Focus Map
plugins.description: Focus Map is a plugin that visualizes the areas of focus within selected objects in your Figma projects. This tool is especially useful for analyzing which parts of a design are drawing the most attention. Once a user selects an object within their Figma file, the areas that have been focused on are automatically highlighted on a map. This allows designers to quickly identify focal points and make more informed adjustments to their projects.
plugins.tagline: Visualize the Focus Areas of Selected Figma Objects

120021.name: Focus Map
120021.description: Focus Map is a plugin that visualizes the areas of focus within selected objects in your Figma projects. This tool is especially useful for analyzing which parts of a design are drawing the most attention. Once a user selects an object within their Figma file, the areas that have been focused on are automatically highlighted on a map. This allows designers to quickly identify focal points and make more informed adjustments to their projects.

plugins.name: Dotsss Annotation Plugin
plugins.description:
Dotsss is a powerful annotation tool designed to streamline competitor research, benchmarking, and design collaboration. With auto-numbered dots that dynamically reorder when added or removed, you can maintain clarity in feedback, specs, and moodboards.


Key Features:

✅ Groups: Create separate dot groups per page or project—each with its own numbering sequence, color, size, and custom name.

✅ Dynamic Numbering: Add or remove dots in any group, and watch numbers auto-update instantly.

✅ Customizable Styles: Tailor each group’s appearance (color/size) to categorize feedback, highlight priorities, or match brand guidelines.

✅ Use Cases: Ideal for annotating competitor UIs, tracking design iterations, marking product specs, or organizing moodboard elements.
plugins.tagline: Annotate with smart dots that reorder as you edit. Organize by group, color, or project. 🎨🔢

123550.name: Dotsss Annotation Plugin
123550.description:
Dotsss is a powerful annotation tool designed to streamline competitor research, benchmarking, and design collaboration. With auto-numbered dots that dynamically reorder when added or removed, you can maintain clarity in feedback, specs, and moodboards.


Key Features:

✅ Groups: Create separate dot groups per page or project—each with its own numbering sequence, color, size, and custom name.

✅ Dynamic Numbering: Add or remove dots in any group, and watch numbers auto-update instantly.

✅ Customizable Styles: Tailor each group’s appearance (color/size) to categorize feedback, highlight priorities, or match brand guidelines.

✅ Use Cases: Ideal for annotating competitor UIs, tracking design iterations, marking product specs, or organizing moodboard elements.
123550.tagline: Annotate with smart dots that reorder as you edit. Organize by group, color, or project. 🎨🔢

plugins.name: Color Mate by UX mate
plugins.description:
Color Mate by UX Mate: Your Color Assistant in Figma


Struggling to create harmonious color palettes? Color Mate is here to be your color confidante in Figma! This user-friendly plugin takes the guesswork out of color selection, allowing you to generate beautiful and cohesive palettes based on a single chosen color.


Here's how Color Mate streamlines your design workflow:


Pick Your Perfect Base: Select any color that sparks your design inspiration – it can be from your existing design or a new hue you've discovered.

Explore a Spectrum of Styles: Choose from various color scheme types like Monochromatic, Contrast, Triadic, and more, each offering a unique color harmony.

Fine-Tune Your Palette: Customize the palette by selecting variations like Pastel, Soft, Light, Hard, Pale, and others – find the perfect balance for your design needs.

Generate Endless Possibilities: Need more palette options? No problem! Color Mate allows you to generate as many palettes as you desire until you find the perfect fit.

Seamless Integration: Once you're happy with your chosen palette, effortlessly create Figma Color Styles directly from the generated colors. This ensures consistent use of your chosen color scheme throughout your design.


With Color Mate, you can:


Save valuable design time: Stop wasting precious minutes mixing and matching colors – Color Mate generates ready-to-use palettes in seconds.

Experiment with confidence: Explore diverse color harmonies without worrying about clashing colors.

Achieve design consistency: Create cohesive color schemes with ease thanks to Figma Style generation.

Color Mate by UX Mate – Your key to effortless and beautiful color palettes in Figma!
plugins.tagline: Your Color Assistant in Figma

plugins.name: MotionPoint Translator
plugins.description:
Overview

Unlock the full potential of your Figma designs with our state-of-the-art plugin. Designed for seamless integration, this tool brings professional translation services into your Figma workflow, automating the creation of translated versions of your designs.


Seamless Integration

Bridge the gap between design and global communication by automating the generation of translated Figma designs. Our plugin ensures your UI/UX resonates with audiences worldwide, offering both human and machine translation options.


Simple Steps to Localization

Language Selection: Start by choosing the languages you want to translate your design into, ensuring a wide-reaching impact.

Translation Quality: Select the desired level of translation quality—opt for Human Translation for nuanced accuracy or Machine Translation for swift turnaround.

Translation Progress: Monitor the translation's progress with ease. Our plugin keeps you updated every step of the way.

Import Translations: Once translations are complete, import them directly from the Progress tab or use the Import tab to generate the translated designs for all selected languages


Effortless Process

With minimal effort, watch as your Figma projects elevate to an international standard. Our plugin simplifies the complexities of localization, letting you focus on what you do best: creating stunning, culturally resonant designs.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly bridge Figma to professional translation, automating your content localization.

plugins.name: Batch Copy Link
plugins.description:
You don't believe it, but this plugin allows you to copy links to Figma objects.


You can copy them as a plain text, Markdown or Jira markup.


Moreover, you can create a Figma frame with all the links. It's useful if you need to create TOC for your page, or a changelog.


To use the plugin simply select Figma objects (e.g. frames), and invoke the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Copy links to frames in different formats, or generate a Figma node with them

plugins.name: DesignFast: Text from Anything (Text from Image, Text from PDF)
plugins.description:
Extract text from any source and transform it into editable Figma designs in one click. Our AI-powered plugin preserves text structure while making it instantly editable in your Figma workspace.


Features:

  1. Text from Image: Extract text from any image with precision.
  2. Text from PDF: Seamlessly convert PDF text to Figma.
  3. Editable Figma Design: Transform extracted content into fully Editable Figma Design.
  4. Privacy-First: Your data stays secure, Not data is stored.


Our mission is to enhance productivity and creativity, making high-level design techniques accessible to all and streamlining the creation of enriching visual content.


More Information

For further details, please visit our official website. https://designfast.io
plugins.tagline: Extract Text to Figma in One Click:  Transform Text into Editable Figma Design

plugins.name: PageLocker
plugins.description:
PageLocker: Secure Your Figma Pages with Ease


PageLocker is a Figma plugin designed to give designers full control over page visibility.


🔑 Key Features:

• Lock Pages Securely: Hide page content while keeping it accessible to designated users with editing rights to copy files to edit.

• Custom Alerts: Automatically display clear, customizable alerts for locked pages, ensuring viewers know access is restricted.

• User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive controls for locking, unlocking, and enabling selective access in just a few clicks.


⚙️ How to Use:

1. Open PageLocker: Launch the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Lock Page: Securely hide all layers with one click. A customizable “Locked Alert” message is displayed to guide viewers.

3. Edit Design: Use the Editing Mode to duplicate layers onto a secure page, edit them freely, and then copy the updates back to the locked page. For added security, you can export the layers to a new Figma file for private editing. Alternatively, open the specific layer you want to edit in “🔧 Edit Mode.” Once finished, copy and replace it in the locked file, and then delete the “🔧 Edit Mode” file.

4. Unlock Page: Fully restore access and visibility for all users when you’re ready to share.
plugins.tagline: Securely lock pages for controlled public sharing.

118201.description:

For added security, you can export the layers to a new Figma file for private editing. Alternatively, open the specific layer you want to edit in “🔧 Edit Mode.” Once finished, copy and replace it in the locked file, and then delete the “🔧 Edit Mode” file.

4. Unlock Page: Fully restore access and visibility for all users when you’re ready to share.
118201.release_notes:
• Now properly handles the 3-page limit for Starter plan users.
• Updated the plugin to comply with Figma’s new page creation restrictions.
118201.tagline: Securely lock pages for controlled public sharing.

plugins.name: Figma to Storyblok
plugins.description:
Figma to Storyblok bridges the gap between design and content management. With just one click, you can export Figma components directly into your Storyblok space, instantly turning them into ready-to-use content blocks.


How to use the Figma to Storyblok Sync plugin:


1. Install the plugin 

Once installed, click Get Started in Figma, go through our onboarding slider, and click Connect Account in the final step.


2. Connect your account 

Use your Personal Access Token, generated in your Storyblok account, to enable a secure and seamless integration.


3. Export from Figma to Storyblok 

Select and export one frame at a time. In Storyblok, each frame becomes a universal block you can use as a component, with an auto-updated image preview.


Have feedback or need help?

Contact us at figma@storyblok.com

accepted.name: Storyblok
accepted.description:
Empowering teams with joyful headless CMS to create, scale, and deliver bigger, faster market impact. 🚀 Let’s connect! 

#Storyblok #HeadlessCMS

plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma components and frames into content blocks within your Storyblok project.

134543.name: Figma to Storyblok
134543.description:
Figma to Storyblok bridges the gap between design and content management. With just one click, you can export Figma components directly into your Storyblok space, instantly turning them into ready-to-use content blocks.


How to use the Figma to Storyblok Sync plugin:


1. Install the plugin 

Once installed, click Get Started in Figma, go through our onboarding slider, and click Connect Account in the final step.


2. Connect your account 

Use your Personal Access Token, generated in your Storyblok account, to enable a secure and seamless integration.


3. Export from Figma to Storyblok 

Select and export one frame at a time. In Storyblok, each frame becomes a universal block you can use as a component, with an auto-updated image preview.


Have feedback or need help?

Contact us at figma@storyblok.com
134543.release_notes: Exported from Figma token - Required for showing the Figma icon in Storyblok Block Library
134543.tagline: Transform your Figma components and frames into content blocks within your Storyblok project.

plugins.name: Export local variables to Json
plugins.description:
Plugin Overview

This plugin takes Local Variables of Figma and outputs them as a JSON file in Style Dictionary format. This allows design tokens to be efficiently reflected in the code.


Main Functions

1. Get Local Variables

- Color values

- Spacing

- Typography

and other variables are automatically retrieved


2. Maintain hierarchical structure

// Maintain Figma structure (e.g.colors/primary/base) in JSON format
{
"colors": {
"primary": {
"base": {
"$value": "#1a2b3c",
"$type": "color"
}
}
}
}


3. Value Conversion

- Colors: Convert from RGBA to HEX format

- Numbers: Manage decimal precision

- Variable references: Properly resolve aliases


How to Use

1. Launch the plugin in Figma

2. Click the "Export" button

3. Download the generated JSON file


Features

- JSON output compliant with Style Dictionary format

- Simple UI

- Error fallback handling

- Comprehensive validation


Applications

- Design system construction

- Batch management of design tokens

- Synchronization with codebase


This plugin enables seamless bridging between design and code.
plugins.tagline: you can export all local variables as json

plugins.name: Gradient Magic
plugins.description:
Gradient Magic helps you enhance your designs by refining gradient transitions with ease. Simply select a layer, and Gradient Magic ensures smooth and visually appealing gradients. Say goodbye to harsh color shifts and enjoy seamless transitions. Whether you’re perfecting a landing page, building a complex design system, or crafting mobile UI, Gradient Magic makes your gradients look polished with minimal effort.


Since each time the plugin runs, it consumes my API requests, if you find this tool useful and would like to support further development, feel free to contribute to my cryptocurrency wallet:


Erc-20: 0x05d90428d0c6f34f674dcbfb13fbf48658c8860a

Solana: 4xHVVnSCbhMhi12EeJPHxa8SAcrkFmYK7tdJQj4JCxaz


Your support is greatly appreciated, and every bit helps! 🥹

plugins.name: Huima
plugins.description:
Huima


Translate designs into development-ready code at lightning speed


Let me automatically handle the tedious task of comparing and reproducing dull design drafts! Export UI-consistent, clean, and tidy frontend code with just one click, allowing frontend engineers to focus on dynamic design and business logic development.


The project is currently in development, and many features may not be stable. If you encounter any bugs or have something to tell us, feel free to leave a message in the GitHub issue. Yes, the code is also there, it's open source.


Features


  • Export page code and static resources that match the design draft with a single click.
  • Support for automatic layout and generation of positioning styles.
  • Support for copying code of any node online.
  • Support for responsive layout units such as rem and vw.
  • Support for partial tailwindcss style conversion.
  • Support for online preview, including font styles.
  • Support for converting styles of most node types to the web environment.


Design Conventions


Converting designs accurately into code is a challenging task that often requires close collaboration between designers and developers, fully understanding the working methods and limitations of each tool.


  • Rotation is not currently supported.


Rendering Conventions


To generate more concise code, the following conventions are applied during rendering:


  • When rendering groups, only the outermost group is rendered by default if nested.
plugins.tagline: Translate designs into development-ready code at lightning speed

plugins.name: Lilly Icon - Free Rive Animated & Static Icons
plugins.description:
What is Lilly Icon?

Lilly Icon is a free and growing collection of static and Rive animated icons. With this Figma plugin, you can easily insert static icons into your designs. For development phase, animated Rive (.riv) versions are available on the Lilly Icon website to bring your projects to life.


Is it really free?

Yes—completely free! No paywalls or sign-ups. All icons are licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0, including the animated ones.


Thanks to your donations, Lilly keeps expanding with more icons and new features.


Created and maintained with love by Sajjad Dashti — graphic, product, and motion designer.

Questions? Reach out at hi@sajjaddashti.ir.
plugins.tagline: Add static Lilly icons to Figma designs with quick search and easy insert.

Is it really free?

Yes—completely free! No paywalls or sign-ups. All icons are licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0, including the animated ones.


Thanks to your donations, Lilly keeps expanding with more icons and new features.


Created and maintained with love by Sajjad Dashti — graphic, product, and motion designer.

Questions? Reach out at hi@sajjaddashti.ir.

plugins.name: Uncodie - Design to App
plugins.description:
Experience Design-Driven Development at Its Finest with Uncodie


Uncodie isn’t just another code exporter—it’s your gateway to a smarter, faster, and more profitable development workflow. This revolutionary Figma plugin empowers your team to effortlessly transform static designs into fully interactive, responsive, and production-ready applications. No lengthy onboarding, no complicated workflows—just one click to go from concept to a live web experience that delights users and drives results.


From Idea to Impact—All in One Place:

1.Full-Featured Web Apps: Turn Figma designs into complete, deployment-ready applications—instantly.

2.Seamless Animations: Animate effortlessly, creating engaging interfaces that keep visitors exploring.

3.Dynamic Data Binding: Connect to real data sources for richer, constantly updated experiences.

4.Interactive Event Handling: Define user actions in Figma, and see them come alive online without extra coding.

5.Built-In SEO Tools: Ensure maximum visibility and higher rankings right from the start.

6.Flexible Deployment Options: Launch on your platform of choice, from affordable shared hosting to robust enterprise solutions.

7.Hosting Integration: Push your app live in just one click—no manual setup required.

8.Auto Layout Preservation: Keep your site looking perfect on every screen size without extra tweaking.

9.Component Library Export: Guarantee brand consistency and speed up future projects by exporting entire component libraries.


Ready to Redefine Your Workflow and Boost Your Bottom Line?

With Uncodie, you don’t just shorten your timeline—you amplify your return on investment. By streamlining collaboration and cutting development overhead, Uncodie helps you focus on what matters: delivering exceptional user experiences that convert. Don’t settle for ordinary—subscribe today and unlock the true potential of design-driven development. Your next big win is just one click away.

accepted.name: Uncodie
accepted.description:

plugins.tagline: The UX Platform for web development

112242.name: Uncodie - Design to App
112242.description:
Experience Design-Driven Development at Its Finest with Uncodie


Uncodie isn’t just another code exporter—it’s your gateway to a smarter, faster, and more profitable development workflow. This revolutionary Figma plugin empowers your team to effortlessly transform static designs into fully interactive, responsive, and production-ready applications. No lengthy onboarding, no complicated workflows—just one click to go from concept to a live web experience that delights users and drives results.


From Idea to Impact—All in One Place:

1.Full-Featured Web Apps: Turn Figma designs into complete, deployment-ready applications—instantly.

2.Seamless Animations: Animate effortlessly, creating engaging interfaces that keep visitors exploring.

3.Dynamic Data Binding: Connect to real data sources for richer, constantly updated experiences.

4.Interactive Event Handling: Define user actions in Figma, and see them come alive online without extra coding.

5.Built-In SEO Tools: Ensure maximum visibility and higher rankings right from the start.

6.Flexible Deployment Options: Launch on your platform of choice, from affordable shared hosting to robust enterprise solutions.

7.Hosting Integration: Push your app live in just one click—no manual setup required.

8.Auto Layout Preservation: Keep your site looking perfect on every screen size without extra tweaking.

9.Component Library Export: Guarantee brand consistency and speed up future projects by exporting entire component libraries.


Ready to Redefine Your Workflow and Boost Your Bottom Line?

With Uncodie, you don’t just shorten your timeline—you amplify your return on investment. By streamlining collaboration and cutting development overhead, Uncodie helps you focus on what matters: delivering exceptional user experiences that convert. Don’t settle for ordinary—subscribe today and unlock the true potential of design-driven development. Your next big win is just one click away.
112242.release_notes:
New:
•Builds cache for faster compilations and deployments.

Improved:
•Linting for layer tags based on layer settings.
•Local variable usage.

Fixed:
•Conditions and variable usage in selectors.
112242.tagline: The UX Platform for web development

plugins.name: UUID Generator
plugins.description:
If you need a name for a node and you don't want to think about it, uuid is your friend.


Features

  • UUID Generator
  • Auto-copy on clipboard the generated UUID
  • Auto-replace the name of the selected nodes
  • Generate UUID for each selected node


This can be used in pair to localization suites like Phrase or Lokalise, to create unique node name and unique translation keys
plugins.tagline: Generate UUID for your texts

72656.name: UUID Generator
72656.description:

This can be used in pair to localization suites like Phrase or Lokalise, to create unique node name and unique translation keys

plugins.name: ark-tailwind-codegen
plugins.description:
This plugin is based on Parbez's figma-tailwindcss plugin


It uses ARK's custom Tailwind theme to convert Figma's CSS output into tailwind classes that can be used in conjunction with our design system.


The source code is available on Github


How to use

  1. Click the Open in... button and choose the file you want to use it in
  2. Go to your file and make sure you’re in Dev Mode (if there are green buttons in the UI, you’re in the right place 👌)
  3. Select the layers you want to generate the class names for
  4. Make sure you have the Inspect panel open on the right-hand side
  5. Scroll down to the 'tailwindcss' section et voilà ✨


  1. If you don’t see this section but instead see an Inspect layer properties button, click it and you should see that section appear
  2. If you still can’t see the section, make sure you’ve got `ark-tailwind-code` plugin selected from dropdown at the top-right of the `Code` section


Todo

  1. [ ] Import tailwind theme from @ark/theming
  2. [ ] Custom typography classes
  3. [ ] Convert layout variables to classes
  4. [ ] Prettier?
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma's css output into tailwind classes that match our custom theme.

plugins.name: Text Resizer
plugins.description: Transform your Figma text layers with ease using the Text Resizer plugin. Seamlessly scale your selected text layers by a specified factor and convert text to uppercase, lowercase, or title case with just a few clicks. This plugin enhances your design workflow by providing a user-friendly interface to make text adjustments quickly and efficiently. Ideal for designers looking to maintain consistency and control over their text elements, Text Resizer is your go-to tool for precise text manipulation in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Resize and Transform Your Text

128747.name: Text Resizer
128747.description: Transform your Figma text layers with ease using the Text Resizer plugin. Seamlessly scale your selected text layers by a specified factor and convert text to uppercase, lowercase, or title case with just a few clicks. This plugin enhances your design workflow by providing a user-friendly interface to make text adjustments quickly and efficiently. Ideal for designers looking to maintain consistency and control over their text elements, Text Resizer is your go-to tool for precise text manipulation in Figma.
128747.release_notes:
✨ Redesigned UI — updated layout with cleaner styling and better alignment

🔠 Title Case support — added "Title Case" conversion option

📏 Improved scaling input — easier number + slider combo with better range

💻 Figma-style experience — buttons, layout, and fonts match native plugins

🧼 Bug fixes & polish — smoother interaction, no layout clipping or scrollbars
128747.tagline: Effortlessly Resize and Transform Your Text

plugins.name: Cider Color Palette
plugins.description:
Cider Color Palette automatically generates hue/value Figma variables as you add, adjust, and remove colors from the Cider HSL sliders.


Instructions:

• Select the 'Cider Alpha' collection from your Local variables palette

• Click the hue and lightness sliders to add new values

• Click or drag the saturation and neutral sliders to set the saturation of all your hues and neutrals.

* Remove any hue or value by dragging it off the slider

• Click any hue or lightness value to rename it


Please send any feedback to lawson.kight@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: Generate and manage color palettes and modes automatically with global HSL sliders.

70907.name: Cider Color Palette

70907.release_notes: Fixes bug where slider preview would not re-appear for neutral and saturation sliders
70907.tagline: Generate and manage color palettes and modes automatically with global HSL sliders.

plugins.name: Capacity Calc
plugins.description:
This plugin is designed to be used in tandem with Kate Pincott's Team Capacity Template.


How to use:

  1. Duplicate the Team Capacity Template from the Figma community
  2. Follow the instructions inside the template file, as it is already configured with plugin relaunch buttons.
